code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(final RestRequest request, final NodeClient client) throws IOException {     ClearVotingConfigExclusionsRequest req = new ClearVotingConfigExclusionsRequest().     if (request.hasParam("wait_for_removal")) {         req.setWaitForRemoval(request.paramAsBoolean("wait_for_removal", true)).     }     return channel -> client.execute(ClearVotingConfigExclusionsAction.INSTANCE, req, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
